long_description: The SmartWool Sulawesi Stripe socks feature soft, moisture-managing merino wool, ultralight cushioning and radiating stripes to brighten your feet, and your sock drawer. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management, so your feet are warm when it's cold but they don't overheat when the temperature rises. WOW (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in high impact areas, improving durability and overall comfort. Merino wool inhibits bacteria that can cause odors. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The SmartWool Sulawesi Stripe socks feature soft, moisture-managing merino wool, ultralight cushioning and radiating stripes to brighten your feet, and your sock drawer.
